title: My Promise

tokens.lyric: I pledge I will go, I pledge I will

lines.raw: [A]I pledge I will go, I pledge I will [E]go;
[F#m]Go as my Father has [E]gone.
[B7]Tears fall on the path,

lines.raw: [E7]Lonely and silent the path of the Father,

lines.raw: [A]Going to suffer the way of the [E7]Cross.

lines.raw: [A]Follow the path of my Lord.
[A]Though thorny the path,

lines.raw: [A]Now persevere as the brightness is growing,

lines.raw: [A]On to the victory and glorious crown,
